import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { cartContext } from '../../context/CartContext'; import CloseIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Close'; import "./Cart.css" import Order from "../Order/Order" import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import Random from '../Random/Random'; const Cart = () => { const { getCart, cart, deleteFromCart, changeProductCount, cartLength } = useContext(cartContext); const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) const [extraProducts, setExtraProducts] = useState([]) const [info, setInfo] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { getCart(); }, []); useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:8000/summer?_limit=2`) .then(response => { setExtraProducts(prev => [...prev, ...response.data]) }) }, []) useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:8000/new?_limit=1`) .then(response => { setExtraProducts(prev => [...prev, ...response.data]) }) }, []) useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:8000/hits?_limit=1`) .then(response => { setExtraProducts(prev => [...prev, ...response.data]) }) }, []) useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:8000/brandnew?_limit=1`) .then(response => { setExtraProducts(prev => [...prev, ...response.data]) }) }, []) console.log(cart.products) return (
{cart.products?.length > 0 ? (
{cart.products?.map((item) => (

{item.item.title}

Цвет:

Размер: {item.item.size}

{item.item.discount ?

{Math.ceil(item.item.price - (item.item.price * item.item.discount / 100))} p{item.item.price} p
:

{item.item.price} p

}

))}
{info ?

Сумма заказа

Количество линеек:

{cartLength} линеек ({cartLength * 5} шт.)

Стоимость:

{cart.totalPrice}

Скидка :

{cart.cartDiscount}

Итого к оплате

{cart.totalPrice - cart.cartDiscount}

:

{cart.totalPrice - cart.cartDiscount}

}

Сумма заказа

Количество линеек:

{cartLength}шт

Количество товаров:

{cartLength * 5}

Стоимость:

{cart.totalPrice}

Скидка :

{cart.cartDiscount}

Итого к оплате

{cart.totalPrice - cart.cartDiscount}

) : <>

Корзина

Возможно Вас заинтересует

{extraProducts.map((item) => ( ))}
}
); }; export default Cart;
